thread.title: Poverty alleviation to help unleash potential of domestic consumption (Beijing Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: Poverty alleviation to help unleash potential of domestic consumption (Beijing Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Poverty alleviation to help unleash potential of domestic consumption (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Children from poor families in Bozhou , Anhui province , receive stationery donated by volunteers. China will work hard to lift about 70 million people in rural areas out of poverty by the end of 2020.
